nodes.bodyText: I think it would be better to place the rule name before the message. Messages are of varying lengths and the rule names will end up misaligned

Hi,
Ok , no problem. I put it there for the moment because @Fernal73 pointed out that this could popetntially break backwards compatibility (see comment #1961 (comment) )
Changed the output to put the RuleName before the description.
Fine with me if backwards compatibility is not an issue. As long as nobody is parsing and stuffing this into a database. Would anybody do this for the text output, anyway?

Would anybody do this for the text output, anyway?

Exactly, I wouldn't be concerned too much about backwards compatibility for this text format. Mentioning the change in the release notes should be enough
Thanks for making the change
Fyi, this is also the case for the other constants, I think, it's easier to correct in an IDE than in GH
